description: As a leading provider of NGS services, CD Genomics is providing an integrated portfolio of methylation sequencing services. Whole genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) is an effective and reliable strategy to identify individually methylated cytosines on a genome-wide scale. With over 10 years of experience and the state-of-the-art next-generation sequencing platforms, we can totally meet your project requirements and budgets in the exploration of methylome.
name: Whole Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS)
